channel.title: 317. PI. Rep++ ASAP!
channel.description:
I decided to try PI 10 minutes ago. And I can't even run the damn thing :D
[code=cmf]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/commo n/IoAcceptor Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.mina.common.IoAcceptor at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What does this error mean? I've no idea.
It appears when i try to run the source.
This is what I have in my [i][u]run.bat[/u][/i]
[code=cmf]@echo off java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
I downloaded this
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466859.0.html
Might Rep++ if you answer this quickly.

item.title: 317. PI. Rep++ ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=474281.msg3469862#msg3469862 date=1295210021]

Add the mina.jar back to the deps/ directory.

It’s missing.

Sorry, but I don’t understand.
[/quote]The MINA.JAR library, which is needed for the Apache MINA networking, is missing.

Add this to your deps/ folder.[/quote]
…Stupid of me to not understand it. My bad ;D

I do have that file. Eventhough i replaced it with yours , the run.bat gives me the same error.

Read full topic
